tool_description: Generates automated alerts based on competitor review monitoring, detecting significant changes in ratings, sentiment, or emerging issues.

monitoring_data_sources.description: Array of data source identifiers to monitor for changes

alert_types.description: Types of alerts to generate: rating_drop, sentiment_decline, volume_spike, new_issues

sensitivity_level.description: Alert sensitivity: low, medium, or high

comparison_period.description: Period to compare against: last_week, last_month, or last_quarter

error_messages: Invalid data sources: One or more monitoring_data_sources not found or inaccessible.
Invalid alert types: Use alert types from [rating_drop, sentiment_decline, volume_spike, new_issues].
Invalid sensitivity level: Use one of [low, medium, high].
Invalid comparison period: Use one of [last_week, last_month, last_quarter].
Insufficient historical data: Not enough data available for the specified comparison_period.
usage: Provide data sources to monitor and configure alert parameters. The tool compares current performance against historical baselines and generates alerts for significant changes.

alerts_generated.description: Number of alerts generated in this monitoring cycle

alert_priorities.description: Priority levels of generated alerts: high, medium, low

alert_summary.description: Summary of all generated alerts and recommended actions
